channel.title: Graphics on Jacob Milligan
channel.description: Recent content in Graphics on Jacob Milligan

item.title: Writing a Game Engine From Scratch
item.description: I’m by no means an experienced graphics, gameplay, or engine programmer. In fact, until 2016 the only game-related projects I’d worked on were for Uni or were toy programs - nothing serious. Don’t get me wrong, I have worked on a lot of toy projects but most of them were scrapped after the initial interest wore off. However, at the end of my first year of Uni I got really into C++ and low-level programming in general and, figuring I’d pair that love with my love of games and work on a big, solid project - a game built on a custom engine made from scratch.
